abstract: trinidad drilling price target raised to c$ 2.55 .
article: trinidad drilling had its price target raised by raymond james financial from c$ 2.35 to c$ 2.55 in a report released on tuesday . raymond james financial currently has an outperform rating on the stock . tdg has been the topic of a number of other reports . royal bank of canada reduced their price target on shares of trinidad drilling from c$ 3.50 to c$ 3.00 and set an outperform rating on the stock in a research report on friday , october 6th . td securities downgraded shares of trinidad drilling from a buy rating to a hold rating and reduced their price target for the stock from c$ 2.25 to c$ 2.00 in a research report on thursday , november 9th .

cibc reduced their price target on shares of trinidad drilling from c$ 2.75 to c$ 2.50 in a research report on friday , october 20th . national bank financial reduced their price target on shares of trinidad drilling from c$ 2.60 to c$ 1.95 and set a sector perform rating on the stock in a research report on friday , november 10th . finally , scotiabank downgraded shares of trinidad drilling from an outperform rating to a sector perform rating and reduced their price target for the stock from c$ 3.25 to c$ 2.50 in a research report on friday , november 10th .

three equities research analysts have rated the stock with a hold rating and four have issued a buy rating to the company . the company currently has a consensus rating of buy and an average target price of c$ 2.43 . trinidad drilling traded up c$ 0.01 during trading on tuesday , hitting c$ 1.74 . 334,621 shares of the stock were exchanged , compared to its average volume of 703,560 . trinidad drilling has a one year low of c$ 1.43 and a one year high of c$ 3.56 . the company has a market cap of $ 478.55 , a p/e ratio of -6.21 and a beta of 1.39 .
